programme.title: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex (But Were Afraid to Ask), (1972, Comedy)
programme.desc: Questions from Dr. David Reuben's sex manual are answered in seven comic sketches, concerning subjects from aphrodisiacs to male anatomy.

programme.title: Soul Plane, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Passengers and crew (Kevin Hart, Method Man) enjoy a wild party aboard an airliner flying from Los Angeles to New York.

programme.title: West Side Story, (1961, Musical)
programme.desc: Against a backdrop of vicious gang warfare between the New Yorker Jets and the Puerto Rican Sharks, a romance develops across rival lines. 1960s update of "Romeo and Juliet", with amazing song and dance sequences.

programme.title: Be Cool, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: Chili Palmer (John Travolta) runs afoul of music-industry players when he teams up with a friend's widow (Uma Thurman) to produce a singer's debut album.

programme.title: Bull Durham, (1988, Romance)
programme.desc: A literary baseball groupie (Susan Sarandon) romances a pitcher (Tim Robbins) and a catcher (Kevin Costner) on a minor-league North Carolina team.

programme.title: Stardust, (2007, Fantasy)
programme.desc: To win the heart of his beloved, a young man (Charlie Cox) ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star (Claire Danes).

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem, (2023, Animated)
programme.desc: The Turtle brothers take on a mysterious crime syndicate, but they soon get in over their heads when an army of mutants is unleashed upon them.

programme.title: Transformers One, (2024, Animated)
programme.desc: Brothers-in-arms Orion Pax and D-16 become sworn enemies Optimus Prime and Megatron.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything they've faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: Aliens, believing actors to be real heroes, enlist cast members of a sci-fi TV series to help save their people.

programme.title: IF, (2024, Family)
programme.desc: After discovering she can see everyone's imaginary friends, a girl embarks on a magical adventure to reconnect forgotten IFs with their kids.

programme.title: The Time Machine, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A scientist (Guy Pearce) travels into the future and meets a race of people who fear hideous monsters living under the ground.

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: Clumsy Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) visits a nudist camp to prove a French maid (Elke Sommer) innocent of murder.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge: Fire & Ice, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: A speed skater (Brendan Fehr) persuades a former figure skater (Francia Raisa) to return to the ice as his partner.

programme.title: Hannah and Her Sisters, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: Hannah's (Mia Farrow) husband (Michael Caine) has an affair with one sister, and her ex-husband (Woody Allen) marries the other.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor, (1963, Comedy)
programme.desc: Goofy professor Kelp's potion turns him into Buddy Love, a lounge singer at ease with a coed and a crowd.

programme.title: Cyrano, (2021, Musical)
programme.desc: Cyrano de Bergerac dazzles everyone with his ferocious wordplay and brilliant swordplay. However, he's convinced his appearance renders him unworthy of the affections of the luminous Roxanne, a devoted friend who's in love with someone else.

programme.title: The Indian in the Cupboard, (1995, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A magic cabinet brings to life a 9-year-old's (Hal Scardino) action figures, including a 3-inch-high Indian named Little Bear (Litefoot).

programme.title: School Ties, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: A scholarship student (Brendan Fraser) hides his Jewish heritage to fit in at an Eastern prep school in the mid-1950s.

programme.title: Challengers, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Tensions run high when a grand slam tennis champion finds himself standing across the net from the once-promising, now burnt-out Patrick, his former best friend and his wife's former boyfriend.

programme.title: The Cider House Rules, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: Raised to be an obstetrician at a Maine orphanage, a young man (Tobey Maguire) leaves to work at a cider mill with a soldier's beloved (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: Field of Dreams, (1989, Fantasy)
programme.desc: An inspired Iowa farmer builds a baseball field, then sees "Shoeless" Joe Jackson's ghost and other marvels.

programme.title: A River Runs Through It, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: Two Montana boys become different men (Craig Sheffer, Brad Pitt) under the influence of fly-fishing and their minister father (Tom Skerritt).

programme.title: The Boys in the Boat, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: During the height of the Great Depression, members of the rowing team at the University of Washington get thrust into the spotlight as they compete for gold at the 1936 Olympics in Berlin.

programme.title: The Portable Door, (2023, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A man lands an internship at a mysterious London firm with unconventional employees, including the charismatic CEO who is incorporating modern corporate strategy into ancient magical practices.

programme.title: Let the Devil In
programme.desc: A chilling discovery of another body thrusts the town of Jefferson, NJ into the national spotlight; whispers of devil worship fuel the fire of a nation engulfed by Satanic Panic; as fear mounts, rumors blur what's real and the supernatural.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: After serving three tours of duty on the front lines of Afghanistan and Iraq for the U.S. Army, Raul Sanchez seeks the comfort of comedy to help with his post-traumatic stress disorder; his act highlights the lighter side of everyday life and war.

programme.title: The Bounty, (1984, Adventure)
programme.desc: Mate Fletcher Christian (Mel Gibson) leads a mutiny against his friend Lt. Bligh (Anthony Hopkins) on an 18th-century voyage to Tahiti.

programme.title: Run the Tide, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: When his drug-addicted mother leaves prison, a man (Taylor Lautner) kidnaps his younger brother (Nico Christou) and flees to the California coast for a better life.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge, (1992, Romance)
programme.desc: An ex-hockey player (D.B. Sweeney) and a prima donna (Moira Kelly) bicker as paired figure skaters shooting for the Olympics.

programme.title: Fargo, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: A pregnant police chief (Frances McDormand) probes the murderous events that evolved from a desperate car salesman's (William H. Macy) kidnapping scheme.

programme.title: Gung Ho, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: American autoworkers have a hard time accepting new work ethics when a Japanese car manufacturer takes over.

programme.title: Benny & Joon, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: An eccentric's arrival complicates the lives of a protective brother and his mentally ill sister, threatening to upend their fragile world.

programme.title: Overboard, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: A yachtsman's (Edward Herrmann) wife (Goldie Hawn) falls overboard, forgets who she is and becomes an Oregon carpenter's (Kurt Russell) mate.

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral, (1994, Romance)
programme.desc: An English charmer (Hugh Grant) and a lusty American (Andie MacDowell) make love over a course of surprising events.

programme.title: Notting Hill, (1999, Romance)
programme.desc: A man's (Hugh Grant) life changes when an international star (Julia Roberts) walks into his bookshop.

programme.title: What Women Want, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: A freak accident gives a Chicago advertising executive (Mel Gibson) the ability to read women's minds.

programme.title: The Terminal, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Unauthorized to enter the United States, an Eastern European (Tom Hanks) befriends a flight attendant (Catherine Zeta-Jones) while living in a New York airport.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Bridge, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: A rich Midwestern lawyer (Paul Newman), his wife (Joanne Woodward) and their children grow apart in the World War II era.

programme.title: Sex Life
programme.desc: Exploring one's wild side with animal role play; reconnecting with a troubled couple; clowning around with a surprising dominatrix.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Four men hijack a crowded subway train and threaten to murder one hostage for every minute the ransom demand is late.

programme.title: Danica
programme.desc: Racing superstar Danica Patrick reveals herself like never before: as a competitor preparing for her next race, a woman confidently considering when she wants to start a family and a budding mogul carefully considering thinking about her next steps.

programme.title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: Doc Holliday (Kirk Douglas) joins Wyatt Earp (Burt Lancaster) and his brothers for a Tombstone showdown with the Clanton gang.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: Paratroopers drop behind enemy lines to penetrate a fortified church and destroy a Nazi transmitter. Making their way to an underground lab, the soldiers stumble upon a sinister experiment that forces them into a battle against an army of the undead.

programme.title: Mulholland Falls, (1996, Mystery)
programme.desc: An ex-lover's murder creates problems for the married head (Nick Nolte) of an elite police unit in early '50s Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: New York stockbroker Jordan Belfort, who founded brokerage firm Stratton Oakmont while still in his early 20s, develops habits of wretched excess and corruption.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Crime boss Vito Corleone (Marlon Brando) and his sons (Al Pacino, James Caan) rule their New York empire with Mafia justice.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II, (1974, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Michael Corleone (Al Pacino) rules his father's criminal empire, while flashbacks recall young Vito's (Robert De Niro) climb to power.

programme.title: The Godfather, Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (1990, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Dignified Michael Corleone (Al Pacino) joins his wild nephew in a Sicilian vendetta involving the Vatican.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: Born and raised in Brooklyn, N.Y., Rob Christensen joins a crew and sells drugs to fit in; to escape that lifestyle, he joins the Air Force, goes to college and finds stand-up, a discovery that changes his life.

programme.title: Hot Pursuit, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: An uptight and by-the-book cop tries to protect the widow of a drug boss as they race through Texas pursued by crooked cops and murderous gunmen.

programme.title: Transformers One, (2024, Animated)
programme.desc: Brothers-in-arms Orion Pax and D-16 become sworn enemies Optimus Prime and Megatron.

programme.title: A Midsummer Night's Sex Comedy, (1982, Comedy)
programme.desc: An inventor (Woody Allen), his wife (Mary Steenburgen) and two other couples spend an enchanted circa-1900 country weekend.

programme.title: Max, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: The family of a fallen Marine adopts his traumatized service dog, giving both the four-legged veteran and a troubled teen the chance to heal.

programme.title: Max 2: White House Hero, (2017, Children)
programme.desc: Max, a military service dog, is assigned to serve on the U.S. president's Secret Service detail.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge: Going for the Gold, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Two ice skaters (Christy Carlson Romano, Ross Thomas) develop a love-hate relationship while dreaming of Olympic glory.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: A man and his wife move to a quaint suburb where most of the women seem to have the same bland personality.

programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fired from her firm, a young Boston lawyer (Reese Witherspoon) heads to Washington, D.C., to fight for animal rights.

programme.title: Beauty Shop, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: After a falling-out with an overbearing employer, reputed hairstylist Gina decides to go independent. Soon enough, she opens the doors of her new salon to an amusing crowd of patrons.

programme.title: Hot Pursuit, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: An uptight and by-the-book cop tries to protect the widow of a drug boss as they race through Texas pursued by crooked cops and murderous gunmen.

programme.title: Thelma & Louise, (1991, Adventure)
programme.desc: An Arkansas waitress (Susan Sarandon) and a housewife (Geena Davis) shoot a rapist and take off in a '66 Thunderbird.

programme.title: Gone Girl, (2014, Mystery)
programme.desc: A man reports that his wife has gone missing on their fifth wedding anniversary, but his public portrait of their blissful union begins to crumble under police pressure and a growing media frenzy.

programme.title: The Gift, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Telling fortunes to support herself and her daughter, a psychic widow (Cate Blanchett) assists the police in a missing persons case.

programme.title: The Ring, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: A journalist (Naomi Watts) investigates the mystery behind a bizarre videotape that brings death after seven days to all who view it.

programme.title: Gone Girl, (2014, Mystery)
programme.desc: A man reports that his wife has gone missing on their fifth wedding anniversary, but his public portrait of their blissful union begins to crumble under police pressure and a growing media frenzy.

programme.title: American Ninja 2: The Confrontation, (1987, Adventure)
programme.desc: Army Rangers (Michael Dudikoff, Steve James) catch a drug lord sorting genes of Marines to create ninja assassins.

programme.title: Bananas, (1971, Comedy)
programme.desc: Rejected by his radical girlfriend (Louise Lasser), a wimpy New Yorker (Woody Allen) heads for San Marcos to lead its revolution.

programme.title: Chaplin, (1992, Biography)
programme.desc: From London poverty to Hollywood legend, silent-film star Charlie Chaplin's (Robert Downey Jr.) life story is told.

programme.title: The Kite Runner, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: After many years living in the U.S., Amir, an Afghan novelist, returns to his Taliban-controlled homeland to learn the fate of his murdered friend's son.

programme.title: The Gift, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Telling fortunes to support herself and her daughter, a psychic widow (Cate Blanchett) assists the police in a missing persons case.

programme.title: The Ring, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: A journalist (Naomi Watts) investigates the mystery behind a bizarre videotape that brings death after seven days to all who view it.

programme.title: The Importance of Being Earnest, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Complications arise after two bachelors (Rupert Everett, Colin Firth) make use of the same pseudonym in 19th-century England.

programme.title: Emma, (1996, Romance)
programme.desc: Things keep getting worse after a young matchmaker (Gwyneth Paltrow) finds a mate for a simple young woman (Toni Collette) in rural 1800s England.

programme.title: Pride & Prejudice, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: A convoluted courtship begins between a young woman (Keira Knightley) and the handsome friend (Matthew Macfadyen) of a wealthy bachelor.

programme.title: Sense and Sensibility, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: Suitors romance, then abandon, sisters (Emma Thompson, Kate Winslet) left destitute by their father's death in late-1800s England.

programme.title: Me Before You, (2016, Romance)
programme.desc: A paralyzed man (Sam Claflin) gets a new lease on life when a cheerful young woman (Emilia Clarke) becomes his caregiver.

programme.title: The Misfits, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: A divorcee (Marilyn Monroe) joins an old cowboy (Clark Gable) and his partners rounding up wild horses for dog food.

programme.title: Ordinary People, (1980, Drama)
programme.desc: A suburban Chicago couple (Donald Sutherland, Mary Tyler Moore) and their son (Timothy Hutton) are torn apart by another son's death.

programme.title: Alive, (2019, Documentary)
programme.desc: Following the conflicts in Iraq and Afghanistan, injured veterans turn to adaptive athletics to heal their physical and emotional battle wounds.

programme.title: Son of the Pink Panther, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Inspector Clouseau's old foe (Herbert Lom) hunts a missing princess with a clumsy gendarme (Roberto Benigni) who happens to be Clouseau's son.

programme.title: Witness, (1985, Crime Story)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.desc: Demanding the release of a political prisoner, a terrorist and his gang hijack the U.S. president's plane.

programme.title: Patriot Games, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: An IRA terrorist vows revenge against the ex-CIA agent who killed the man's brother and thwarted an attack on royalty.

programme.desc: Disgruntled Chicago White Sox stand trial for allegedly throwing the 1919 World Series for mobster Arnold Rothstein (Michael Lerner).

programme.desc: A court-martialed general (Robert Redford) leads a revolt against a corrupt warden (James Gandolfini) in a military prison.

The couple loses their first child shortly after birth but are overjoyed when they have twins a year later. Tensions began to rise when Rodney loses his job and goes into debt. Rodney blames their fights on Morgan's drinking ? even if she'd only had one ? and convinces Morgan that she pushed him down the stairs in a blackout rage.

But when a mysterious stranger moves in next door, sparks fly, and Carrie begins to feel an unexpected connection. As their relationship intensifies, her dark past resurfaces, threatening to destroy the life she's fought so hard to rebuild.

programme.title: Esto de volta Homem Mssil, Wild e Baro Owl diante de Manabu que se anima no aprendizado afim de superar a real fora de Jiraiya. Ao mesmo tempo, um sussurro demonaco aproximasse do pequeno Manabu, que se torna vtima de uma cilada.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: Um dia a famlia Yamaji recebe a visita de um estranho velho. Qual passado sombrio esconde-se por trs dos incidentes na cidade? Um discpulo se afasta do mundo dos ninjas e abandona seu esprito e tornando-se maligno.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: Surge a famosa espada de Nobutora, sentindo o seu cheiro Beni Lagarto e Parchis voltam a vida. Novamente uma mulher ninja e um grupo internacional de investigadores se envolvem em uma batalha. uma terrvel e magnfica luta.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: Surge a misteriosa sombra de uma mulher. Ser ela humana ou um fantasma? Estranhos acontecimentos na pousada das estudantes colegiais so investigados por Touha e Kei. Diante deles surge um conhecido nevoeiro.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: Chega um telegrama de desafio do Rainin Wild. Uma covarde armadilha montada pelos Yonma e assim comea uma luta decisiva. No limite da batalha entre a arma e a espada qual ser a condio imposta?

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: A academia de Jiraya no vai muito bem e surge uma nova academia de ninjas. A diretora da escola Morgana e aprisiona todas as crianas reprovadas para entrar na escola. O que ser que ela est tramando? Jiraya conseguir salvar as crianas?

programme.title: Alm do Horizonte, (1970, Adventure)

programme.title: Alex & Emma - Escrevendo sua Histria de Amor, (2003, Romantic comedy)

programme.title: O Prazer de sua Companhia, (2006, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Um cara pede sua namorada em casamento e ela simplesmente cai morta. Seu melhor amigo insiste em arrumar encontros para ele. Certo dia, para tirar o amigo do seu p, ele pede uma garonete em casamento - ela aceita e uma grande confuso comea.

programme.title: Como Casar com um Milionrio?, (2019, Romantic comedy)

programme.title: Um Perfil Para Dois, (2017, Romantic comedy)

programme.title: Ligados pelo Amor, (2012, Romantic comedy)

programme.title: Algum inesperado est aqui para se juntar a Raimon no meio da partida - Aphrodi! O rival de Raimon veio se juntar e lutar ao lado deles.

programme.title: O tcnico Hitomiko decide remover Endou como goleiro e pede que ele se torne um libero. Depois disso, Aphrodi se tornar um atacante e Tachimukai se tornar o novo goleiro de Raimon.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: O Raimon Eleven chega a Teikoku para treinamento, conforme solicitado por Kidou. Kidou tambm pede que seus ex-colegas de equipe - o time Teikoku jogue um amistoso contra o Raimon com Endou, Kidou e Domon do lado de Teikoku.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Prominence e Diamond Dust se combinaram para se tornar a equipe mais forte do universo - The Chaos - e desafiam Raimon para um jogo. Este o primeiro jogo que Raimon joga em sua nova formao.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Graas a Otomura, Kidou descobre como parar o ritmo do Caos. O fluxo do jogo totalmente revertido, pois Raimon continua marcando sem parar.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Raimon exige que o treinador Hitomiko explique por que Gran a chamou de irm, entre outras coisas. Ela promete explicar tudo depois que eles chegarem ao Monte Fuji.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Quando Raimon entra na Academia Aliea, sua verdade chocante revelada: a Academia Aliea so crianas humanas cujas habilidades foram aprimoradas pelo meteorito Aliea.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Assassino Americano, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: O gngster americano Erik Vasquez est planejando se tornar o principal chefe do submundo mexicano, apenas para se ver fazendo inimigos tanto dos poderosos cartis quanto de seus prprios aliados.

programme.title: Codinome Cassius 7, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: A morte de um senador americano faz o ex-agente da CIA Paul abandonar a aposentadoria e se juntar a um jovem oficial do FBI em uma eletrizante operao internacional para desvendar os muitos mistrios por trs do crime.

programme.title: Desejo de Vingana, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Quando uma jornalista informada por um agente do FBI que seu marido acaba de ser assassinado, os dois unem foras para desvendar uma rede de enganos chocante e mortal.

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingana Explosiva, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Ruslan Drachev um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experincias. Ao visitar sua famlia ele descobre que sua filha est casando com o filho de um arqui-inimigo do mundo do crime.

programme.title: Dupla em Fria, (2013, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Uma onda de assassinatos sacode Hong Kong. O jovem detetive Wang Bu Er tem certeza de que eles so o trabalho de um assassino em sriee, junto com Huang Fei Hong, um mestre do kung, eles empreendem uma aventura em ritmo acelerado para investigar o caso.

programme.title: Codinome Cassius 7, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: A morte de um senador americano faz o ex-agente da CIA Paul abandonar a aposentadoria e se juntar a um jovem oficial do FBI em uma eletrizante operao internacional para desvendar os muitos mistrios por trs do crime.

programme.title: O Rei das Armas, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Um criminoso se rene com um velho amigo aps uma troca de armas fracassada.

programme.title: Cosmopolis, (2012, Thriller)
programme.desc: Durante o dia, Eric Packer, o menino de ouro do mundo financeiro, observa o caos na cidade e percebe, impotente, o colapso do capitalismo. Packer vive as 24 horas mais importantes da sua vida e est certo de algum esta prestes a assassin-lo.

programme.title: Um Passado Sombrio, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: A detetive Nancy Porter, que no conseguiu salvar uma menina, investiga o desaparecimento de outra menina oito anos depois na mesma cidade onde vivem as duas mulheres culpadas da morte da primeira menina.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adio Indesejada
programme.desc: Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de Deidara, Gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo. A aldeia salva a um enorme custo. Gaara fica vulnervel. As tentativas de seus companheiros so inteis, e Gaara acaba caindo nas mos de Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Falso Sorriso
programme.desc: Gaara arrastado para longe por Deidara. Kankuro sai com um peloto para salvar Gaara, mas os Akatsuki haviam instalado armadilhas engenhosas. Determinado, Kankuro encontra sozinho os Akatsuki. A nova equipe de Naruto comemora sua primeira misso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo
programme.desc: Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como tambm hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara est sofrendo. Kankuro infectado por um veneno. Sem um antdoto, ele ter poucos dias de vida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao
programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi
programme.desc: Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vov Chiyo, perita em veneno, chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara comeam o jutsu de selamento e os nove drages fantasmas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta
programme.desc: Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mos firmes. Vov Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua prpria aprendiz e pela determinao de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informaes sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um co de caa ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia
programme.desc: Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos Akatsuki. Temari recebe ordens para ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vov Chiyo se oferece para ficar no lugar de Temari. Naruto e Sakura ficam chocados com a histria das bestas de cauda.
programme.sub-title: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe comeam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lana um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura
programme.desc: Guy se arrepende ao ver seus trs alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxignio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi comea um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguio recomea, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto tambm um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara engolfado por uma luz branca.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra!
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma viso chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha
programme.desc: Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo
programme.desc: Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente comea a ler os padres de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espao, Sakura atingida na mo e infectada pelo veneno!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vov Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cpias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vov Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. Kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan, um poderoso jutsu que transporta tudo o que o olho pode ver para outra dimenso. Naruto finalmente consegue salvar Gaara, mas fica enfurecido ...

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde o controle e o esprito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Cho-Cho fica com medo por achar que est sendo observada, ento ela decide pegar a pessoa desprevenida.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Um Jutsu Visual coloca Boruto dentro de um sonho. Depois disso, Boruto passa a afirmar que o sonho fez despertar seu Byakugan, o Kekkei Genkai do cl Hyuga, de sua me.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sob a superviso de seu pai e seu av, Boruto treina com sua tia Hanabi. Ele se esfora muito, mas no consegue ativar o Byakugan de jeito nenhum.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto apelida a sombra misteriosa de "O Fantasma" e fica animado quando seus amigos, Shikadai e Mitsuki, se juntam a ele para resolver os recentes "Incidentes de Fantasmas".
programme.sub-title: O incidente do fantasma: A investigao comea!

programme.desc: Em trabalho escolar sobre profisses, Sumire, Wasabi Izuno e Namida Suzumeno acabam se envolvendo em um Incidente de Fantasma e se machucam.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: De repente, os Incidentes de Fantasmas param, deixando Boruto e seus colegas de classe intrigados. No entanto, parece que Mitsuki sabe de algo que eles no sabem.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Aps a investigao de Sai, o Stimo Hokage, Naruto e seus principais conselheiros ficam perplexos ao descobrir quem o culpado. Ento Nue, uma fera enorme de outro mundo, aparece!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O falecido Danzo Shimura foi o fundador e lder da Fundao, uma organizao de Caadores Especiais Anbu de elite.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Os Incidentes de Fantasmas que ameaaram a Aldeia da Folha chegam ao fim. Agora Boruto se v incapaz de despertar o poder misterioso que ele havia usado.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O dia da prova est cada vez mais prximo e todos da Academia esto se preparando. Quem falhar ter que repetir a srie.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sarada concorda em entregar um ursinho de pelcia para um paciente no hospital, mas acaba esquecendo o urso no trem e entra em pnico.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto faz uma pegadinha, e Naruto corre atrs dele pela aldeia. Ao ver isso, Sarada fica irritada, mas ao mesmo tempo pensativa sobre seu pai, Sasuke, que no a v desde beb.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sarada duvida que Sakura seja sua me biolgica, e se junta a Cho-Cho, que est prestes a sair em uma jornada em busca dos seus "pais verdadeiros".

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sarada chega na torre onde o pai est, mas acaba se magoando com a atitude inesperada de Sasuke.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sarada fica em choque aps Sakura ser capturada pelo jutsu de Shin. Nem mesmo Naruto, com suas habilidades de rastreamento excepcionais, consegue localiz-la.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.desc: Boruto e seus colegas de classe so convidados para conhecer a Academia da Aldeia da Nvoa acompanhados de Kagura e Chojuro.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Yoko, (2012, Children)
programme.desc: Uma menina em luto conhece Yoko, um ser cheio de bondade e gentileza.

programme.title: Meu Amigo Ninja, (2018, Animated)
programme.desc: Em uma fbrica ilegal de bonecas na Tailndia, um empresrio malvado explora crianas trabalhadoras. Aps um infeliz acidente, uma boneca ganha vida e viaja para a Dinamarca, onde faz amizade com um garoto, pedindo ajuda para se vingar.

programme.title: Em Busca do Paraso, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Forado fazer uma jornada perigosa, um nobre guerreiro se depara com inmeras dificuldades, lugares misteriosos, magia e aventura para chegar ao que seria o paraso distante.

programme.title: O Jovem Viking, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Halvdan um menino diferente, longe do tipo ideal de viking para sua aldeia. Quando ele conhece Meia, a filha do chefe da tribo inimiga, comea uma incrvel aventura sobre amizade e superao de diferenas.

programme.title: Meu Querido Elfo, (2019, Children)
programme.desc: Uma me solteira compra um apartamento antigo, sem saber que uma criatura mtica um elfo domstico vive no apartamento h sculos. Os novos donos da casa precisaro fazer amizade com o elfo, cuja tarefa justamente proteger o local de uma bruxa.

programme.title: Shin-Ultraman, (2022, Adventure)
programme.desc: A Terra est sob ataque. Invasores aliengenas, conhecidos como Espcie Classe S, devastam o planeta. A humanidade, em sua luta desesperada pela sobrevivncia, deposita sua esperana em um gigante guerreiro vindo do espao.

programme.title: Ricardo Corao de Leo, (2014, Adventure)
programme.desc: Na Europa da Idade Mdia, os reinos da Inglaterra e da Frana esto a beira da guerra. O rei ingls, Henrique II, j com a idade avanada e a sade j debilitada, prepara o seu sucessor, um de seus filhos, para governar e levar o reino a vitria.

programme.title: A Viagem, (2012, Adventure)
programme.desc: Uma explorao de como as aes de vidas individuais impactam umas s outras no passado, presente e futuro, como uma alma vai de assassino a heri, e um ato de bondade se espalha ao longo dos sculos para inspirar uma revoluo.

programme.title: Lucia e o Cristal Mgico, (2020, Children)
programme.desc: Lucia a primeira menina da Escola Internacional de Natal. Quando seu melhor amigo, Oscar, acusado de roubar o cristal mgico do Rei Inverno, que alimenta a mquina atual, Lucia se prope a provar a inocncia dele.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: O Matador - Misso Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele est cuidando sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Police Story 2 - Codinome: Radical, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Os mtodos incomuns de um policial de Hong Kong levam ao seu rebaixamento para o trnsito, apesar do sucesso. Enquanto isso, um antigo inimigo sai da priso em busca de vingana.

programme.title: Batalha dos Imprios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legio de mil soldados no pas e com o comandante do protetorado das Regies Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliao, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que no voltaria para a Tailndia, mas algum o seda e o fora a retornar ao pas asitico.

programme.title: Liga dos Deuses, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: A histria conta como o Rei Zhou de Shang se torna um tirano devido s astcias de Daji, um esprito vixen que est disfarado como uma de suas concubinas.

programme.title: O Drago Invencvel, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente da polcia paisana procura vingana contra um sindicato do crime implacvel aps o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: O Monge Prova de Balas, (2020, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma histria em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a histria de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: Mscara Negra, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: O sobrevivente de um projeto para criar super soldados deve lutar contra seus ex-companheiros como um heri mascarado.

programme.title: Sands of Iwo Jima, (1950, War)
programme.desc: Tough-as-nails career Marine Sergeant John Stryker is greatly disliked by the men of his squad, particularly the combat replacements, for the rigorous training he puts them through.

programme.title: The Life And Death Of Colonel Blimp, (1943, War Drama)
programme.desc: From the Boer War through World War II, a soldier rises through the ranks in the British military.

programme.title: Black Narcissus, (1947, Drama)
programme.desc: A group of nuns struggle to establish a convent in the Himalayas, while isolation, extreme weather, altitude, and culture clashes all conspire to drive the well-intentioned missionaries mad.

programme.title: The Sterile Cuckoo, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, an eccentric girl forces a college love affair with a reluctant student. Nominated for 2 Academy Awards including Best Song "Come Saturday Morning."

programme.title: Goodbye, Columbus, (1969, Romance)
programme.desc: Neil is a poor Bronx librarian and Brenda is a pampered Jewish princess from Westchester. Benjamin and MacGraw are superb in their film debuts as lovers who try to cross class lines amidst kisses and her parents' stiff opposition.

programme.title: The Odd Couple, (1968, Screwball)
programme.desc: Two divorced men decide to share a New York apartment. Fussy Felix, fastidious to a fault. He proves that cleanliness is next to insanity. And Oscar, who wreaks havoc on a tidy room with the speed and thoroughness of a tornado.

programme.title: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World, (1963, Screwball)
programme.desc: Spencer Tracy leads a hilariously zany cast of Hollywood's greatest comedians (including Milton Berle, Sid Caesar, Ethel Merman and Mickey Rooney) as eight vacation-bound motorists set off on a mad-cap, side-splitting race to find a stolen fortune!

programme.title: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum, (1966, Music)
programme.desc: Zero Mostel, Buster Keaton, Phil Silvers, and an all-star cast scam their way through this boisterous romp amidst gorgeous girls, mistaken identities, stunning surprises, cunning disguises, and great Sondheim songs.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Everly, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: An intense action-thriller centered on a down-on-her-luck woman (Salma Hayek) trapped in her apartment.

programme.title: Coming to America, (1988, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Head of State, (2003, Political Comedies)
programme.desc: When Washington desperately needs a presidential candidate just weeks before the election, they need someone sure to lose. They pick Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock), an unknown local politician from a down-and-out D.C. neighborhood, to be their puppet.

programme.title: Boomerang, (1992, Romantic comedy)

programme.title: Slaughter In San Francisco [English-Language Version], (1974, Action)
programme.desc: A Chinese-American cop, skilled in martial arts, battles the most powerful criminal gang in San Francisco that is responsible for the death of his partner.

programme.desc: Action superstar Chuck Norris stars as John T. Booker, the former leader of an elite commando unit who must uncover the reason why his former squad members are being systematically murdered one by one. Anne Archer and James Franciscus co-star.

programme.desc: In this thrill-a-minute film, action superstar Chuck Norris stars as a martial arts champion enlisted to help track down a serial killer...and the man responsible for the murder of his adoptive son. Jennifer O'Neill and Clu Gulager also star.

programme.title: Lone Wolf McQuade, (1983, Action)

programme.title: After escaping from the cave, Naruto and the others chase after the Kedouin in order to put a halt to their plot, but the Village Hidden in the Leaves is already under attack.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto discovers Jiraiya is up to no good. Jiraiya claims to be busy getting his manuscript ready before his deadline. Impatient and irritated, Naruto writes his own manuscript for Jiraiya!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Hidden Leaf Village receives a request from the Village Hidden in the Stars to guard a star. The star is actually a meteorite that fell 200 years ago and is said to possess mysterious powers.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others investigate the whereabouts of the stolen star. The team suspects that is an inside job because the ninja who took the star used the ninja art, Kujaku, from the Star Village.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Akahoshi, the masked ninja who kidnapped Sumaru, intends to use Sumaru to call out the mysterious ninja who stole the star.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The masked ninja and Naruto fall into the depths of the Valley. While tending to Naruto's wounds, the masked ninja tells him the reason for stealing the star.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Natsuhi's body is reacting to the effects of the star. She wields the star and desperately confronts Akahoshi, but Sumaru is taken as hostage
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sumaru senses his mother's death and Naruto is unable to stop an angry Sumaru from running off. To save Sumaru, Hokuto and Mizura stake their lives to reveal the truth behind the star training.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Akamaru is injured by a rival shinobi from another nation. The shinobi used a battle skill that spreads bacteria throughout the opponent's body, infecting the victim's mental faculties. This causes Akamaru to go into uncontrollable rampage!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: A mysterious being attaches itself to Naruto, while he was training in the forest. Tsunade begins to wonder if it isn't the legendary being known as the "Onbaa."
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and Shino are given a mission to provide security during the Kagetsu family funeral, but they soon realize that the real mission is to help the eldest son carry out the man's unusual last will and testament!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: An ominous black smoke appears over the Land of Greens, and all of sudden Choji and company are attacked by an unidentified Ninja!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: While questioning Yurinoshin and Shun, the Hidden Leaf squad learns the truth about Shun's true identity.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others are attacked by Ruiga, the first evil ninja, who can draw water from the earth to use as weapons.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is again attacked by the second evil ninja, Jiga. Jiga threatens Naruto's life when Hinata rushes in to save Naruto, but Hinata resists the threats and begins to fight!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and Haruna are confronted by Renga. Declaring that he has taken down others before them, he advances on Naruto, ordering him to hand over the princess!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The princess has gained weight due to nerves and wants Ino to pose as the princess in order to attend the first meeting with a prince she adores.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Lee opens a dojo because he feels like he isn't keeping up with his training. He is hoping challengers will come to his dojo to face him in battle.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The first lady of the Land of Honey and her entourage have disappeared. Naruto, Kiba, and Hinata are sent on a mission and they discover an eerie castle looming in the middle of the road!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: During Lee's medical check-up, he discovers that there's a lot of damage in his chakra network. Guy tries to cheer him up by taking Lee to the Academy training hall.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Seeking revenge for his dead father, Genho, Yagura's true identity and oldest sibling of the Ryudoin Brothers confronts Guy using a unique Jutsu.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The ANBU Black Ops suspect that Genno, a carpenter of Hidden Leaf Village, stole important blueprints of the village. Tsunade concludes that the one who used Genno plans to attack the Village and puts the village on Super S-Rank Alert!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: ANBU Black Ops puts Naruto under retro-hypnosis to extract Genno's motives. Without much success, Hidden Waterfall Village will be conducting maneuvers close to the village borders.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.desc: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

programme.title: All Styles, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: The Motel, (2005, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Puberty sucks, and nobody knows it better than 13-year-old Ernest. As he watches guests come and go, Ernest finds himself forever stuck at his family's hourly-rate motel and longing for the girl of his dreams, 15-year-old Christine.

programme.title: When We Were Kings, (1997, Documentary)
programme.desc: A documentary of the 1974 heavyweight championship bout in Zaire, 'The Rumble in the Jungle,' between champion George Foreman and underdog challenger Muhammad Ali.

programme.title: All Styles, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: Man of the House, (2005, Screwball)
programme.desc: A hard-edged Texas Ranger goes undercover to protect a group of college cheerleaders after they witness a murder.

programme.title: When We Were Kings, (1997, Documentary)
