programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: Basic Instinct, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: San Francisco detective Nick Curran is investigating the murder of a once-celebrated rock star, and he's made a few unsettling discoveries: a bloody ice pick, a white silk scarf tied to a bedpost, and evidence of an otherwise romantic evening.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiance, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Ichabod Crane, an investigator determined to stop the murderous Headless Horseman.

programme.title: Idle Hands, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: The devil will find work for idle hands to do, but what happens when he chooses the laziest teen slacker in the world to do his dirty work? Anton Tobias is a couch potato burn-out who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand. Rated: R

programme.title: Multiplicity, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: Michael Keaton and Andie MacDowell star in director Harold Ramis' brilliant comedy about a man who clones himself to save his marriage, and then almost loses his wife to himself! Keaton takes on four hilariously distinct roles.

programme.title: High School High, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: From the creators of the Naked Gun series comes High School High. Richard C. Clark is an idealisticyoung teacher who leaves a position at a prestigious school headed by his own father to teach at Marion Barry High.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ace Ventura Pet Detective is on the case to find the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot and quarterback Dan Marino. He goes eye to eye with sharks, stakes out the Miami Dolphins and woos and wows the ladies. He always gets his man...or beast.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Africa's the place where Ace is on the case, setting out to rescue an animal he loathes - a bat! If you're ready to laugh like a pack of hyenas, if you want more fun than an industrial-sized barrel of monkeys, you'll know what to do. Heed the call.

programme.title: Multiplicity, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: Michael Keaton and Andie MacDowell star in director Harold Ramis' brilliant comedy about a man who clones himself to save his marriage, and then almost loses his wife to himself! Keaton takes on four hilariously distinct roles.

programme.title: Swingers, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: In this laugh-out-loud indie comedy classic that launched the careers of its outstanding cast, two friends set out to rewrite modern dating from Los Angeles to Las Vegas.

programme.title: Rancho Deluxe, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: Jack (Jeff Bridges) and Cecil (Sam Waterston) are an oddball team of modern-day Montana cattle rustlers, and theyve set their sights on a pair of unlikely ranch owners from New York (Clifton James, Elizabeth Ashley). But can they outfox the foxes?

programme.title: The Long Goodbye, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Under the inimitable direction of Robert Altman, Elliot Gould stars as the laid-back, legendary private eye Philip Marlowe investigating a mysterious murder. Also stars Sterling Hayden and Nina Van Pallandt.

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Caan portrays a compulsive gambler who can't quit or win. He falls into debt to the mob for $40,000 but seems to relish the thrill of gambling against the long shot.

programme.title: Gone In 60 Seconds, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Buckle-up as Eleanor, the fast and furious Ford Fastback Mustang, takes you on a full-throttle ride you'll never forget. The Assignment: To steal 48 muscle and exotic cars! The Challenge: Avoid getting caught!

programme.title: The Organization, (1971, Action)
programme.desc: The dangerous world of international heroin trafficking is exposed in this elaborate and suspenseful crime thriller which reprises Sidney Poitier's role as Lt. Virgil Tibbs.

programme.title: Real Life, (1979, Mockumentaries)
programme.desc: In his directorial debut. Brooks presents a hilarious account of what happens to a typical American family when a group of filmmakers moves in with them to record "real life."

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen is in prime form in this celebrated comedy and 1977 Best Picture Oscar-winner in which he portrays a highly neurotic comedy writer who falls head-over-heels in love with a naive small-town girl (Diane Keaton) who aspires to be a singer.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Music)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Caan portrays a compulsive gambler who can't quit or win. He falls into debt to the mob for $40,000 but seems to relish the thrill of gambling against the long shot.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the second match of the KC Grand Championship as Rebecca faces the kung-fu kicking Asia champion Vivian Wong. However, there's more at stake than just winning the duel - Yugi's heart is on the line, whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship. Unfortunately for Joey, his next opponent is Zigfried Lloyd, who defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor in one turn.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zigfried activates Ride of the Valkyries, the same card that defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor at the same time.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the semifinals of the KC Grand Championship, it's a duel between child prodigies as Rebecca faces Leon Wilson and his fairy tale faction.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi finds Grandpa's kidnapper, but is it really a kidnapping? While Yugi unravels the truth, Rebecca starts to unravel when her dragons fall prey to Leon's fervent fables. Rebecca must think of a new plan quickly or there will be no happy ending.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Zigfried vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a battle between Zigfried and Kaiba. Zigfried quickly gains the advantage by destroying Kaiba's monsters before he can even draw them!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! Something sinister lurks in the shadows, for this duel is more than just getting the crown. Zigfried's greatest revenge will commence as his real plan is unleashed.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Leon is Zigfried's younger brother, and he'll avenge his family's loss. Leon's fairy tales are giving Yugi nightmares but the worst is yet to come as Leon has Zigfried's mysterious and special card.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world's Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp. If Yugi doesn't destroy the card, the virus program can't be stopped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang goes on an exotic trip to India, but when their plane crashes in a deserted forest, their vacation turns into a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Fiveor so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: The assassins of Baroque Works gather at Spiders Caf, and the Straw Hats arrive at Yuba only to find it buried in sand.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Spiders Caf? at 8 o'Clock! The Enemy Leaders Gather!

programme.title: Crocodile reveals himself to the Baroque Works assassins and discloses his dastardly plan for Alabasta. After departing Yuba, Luffy takes a stand that forces Vivi to rethink her mission.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy vs. Vivi! The Tearful Vow to Put Friends on the Line

programme.title: Vivi takes Luffys advice, and the Straw Hats head towards Rainbase for a confrontation with Crocodile. Karoo finally reaches the palace with Vivis warning for King Cobra.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battlefront of Alabasta! Rainbase, the City of Dreams

programme.title: Luffy leads a daring but foolish raid on Crocodiles casino. His poor planning lands him behind bars with Captain Smoker and more importantly, leaves Vivi unprotected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Trap of Certain Defeat! Storming Raindinners!

programme.title: While the Straw Hats are stuck in the clink, King Cobra addresses the starving people of Nanohana. Will his unbelievable revelation drive his subjects past the brink of rebellion?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Operation Utopia Commences! The Swell of Rebellion Stirs!

programme.title: A royal imposter has the rebel army hell-bent on bringing Cobras reign to a violent end. Meanwhile, Luffy and his mates find themselves in deep trouble and even deeper water.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Terrifying Banana Gators and Mr. Prince!

programme.title: Sanji shows up in the nick of time to make the crocs cough up the key to Luffys freedom, but the ravenous reptiles spit up something else instead.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Key to a Great Comeback Escape! The Wax-Wax Ball!

programme.title: Crocodile snatches Vivi off the back of a giant crab, but Luffys not having it. The rubber-man goes toe-to-toe with the sandman in a battle that will end in bloodshed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Merciless Mortal Combat! Luffy vs Crocodile

programme.title: Crocodile puts Luffy down for a never-ending dirt nap, and the Straw Hats get a lift from a crabby ally in their race to stop the looming rebellion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dash For a Miracle! Alabasta Animal Land

programme.title: Vivi arrives in Alubarna with just enough time to stop the rebellion, but the agents of Baroque Works lurk in every corner, waiting to sabotage her plans for peace.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rebel Army vs. Royal Army! Showdown at Alubarna

programme.title: Sanji buys Vivi some time by mixing it up with a foe of many faces. Outside Alubarnas walls, Chopper and Usopp tangle with Miss Merry Christmas and her slugging sidekick.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Alubarna Grieves! The Fierce Captain Karoo

programme.title: Usopp finally shows some courage by using a five-ton hammer to play whack-a-mole with Miss Merry Christmas. He may be bluffing, but the distraction lets Chopper zero in on the enemys weakness.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sworn on a Friend's Dream! The Battle of Molehill, Block 4

programme.title: Choppers Rumble Ball could be the difference between life and death in the mole ballgame. Elsewhere, Sanji has trouble kicking a pretty enemy, and Vivi proposes something unthinkable.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big Opening Day Today! The Copy-Copy Montage

programme.title: Vivi continues preparations to blow up the palace; Zorro puts his steel to the test against a lethal blade-man; Sanji tries to overcome his inability to kick a foxy lady!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Transformed into Nami! Bon Clay's Rapid-Fire Ballet Kenpo!

programme.title: Things dont look good for the prettiest Straw Hat. Namis about to tangle with a thorny adversary, and the weapon Usopp built her is only good for party tricks!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Nami's Cyclone Advisory! Clima Tact Burst!

programme.title: Crocodile reveals his sinister motives for attacking Alabasta, and Nami tries to end her duel with Miss Doublefinger by unleashing the Clima Tacts ultimate weapon: a devastatingly lethal tornado!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Secret Passed Down In The Royal Family! The Ancient Weapon Pluton!

programme.title: Zoro hopes to attain a new level of strength when he fights a foe with a body made of blades. The Straw Hat sword-slinger is determined to become a man who can cut steel or die trying.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Secret Of Powerful Swordplay! Ability To Cut Steel And The Rhythm Things Have!

programme.title: Koza the leader of the rebel army finally discovers the evil mastermind behind Alabastas drought, but is he too late to prevent further bloodshed?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle is Over! Koza Raises the White Flag!

programme.title: When Koza is mysteriously shot, the rebellion is reborn, but Vivis cries for a cease-fire fall on deaf ears until a long-overdue hero swoops to the rescue!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Where Vivi's Voice Gets Heard! The Hero Descends!

programme.title: Luffy finally discovers the secret to knocking out a sandman, but it wont matter unless Vivi and the rest of the Straw Hats can locate the Baroque Works bomber.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sand Croc and Water Luffy!... The Second Round of the Duel!

programme.title: While his mates search for a bomb, Luffy narrowly survives his second scrape with Crocodile. Across town, Nico Robin strong-arms Cobra into revealing his countrys greatest secret.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: That Looks Croc-ish!... Luffy, Run to the Royal Tomb!

programme.title: With the walls crumbling down around them, Crocodile attacks Luffy with a poisoned pirate hook. Meanwhile, Vivi draws a bead on the bombers, but can she stop them in time?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Nightmare Draws Near!... This is the Sand-Sand Clan's Secret Base

programme.title: The Straw Hats team up to give Vivi one last shot at disarming the bomb that threatens to destroy her city. She succeeds in cutting the fuse, but Crocodile has a backup plan.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Magnificent Wings! My Name is Pell, Guardian Deity of the Country

programme.title: Pells sacrifice spares his beloved city, but only an act of god can stop the rebellion. With Crocodiles poison coursing through his body, Luffy musters a final attack against Alabastas oppressor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Will Surpass You! Rain Falls in Alabasta.

programme.title: Crocodile is defeated, the rain has returned to Alabasta, and Vivis people are eager to rebuild their kingdom. As for the Straw Hats, they have a fleet of marines breathing down their necks.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Farewell to Arms! Pirates and Different Ideas of Justice!

programme.title: Now that the rebellion is over, Vivi must make an important decision about her future. The Straw Hats are ready to hoist the anchor, but an ambiguous villain has stolen the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Pirates' Banquet And Operation Escape From Alabasta!

programme.title: Mr. 2 is a man of many faces, but he finally shows his true colors when the marines attack the Straw Hats. Elsewhere, Vivi has a scheme up her sleeve, and it involves Igaram wearing a dress.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: It All Started On That Day...! Vivi Tells The Story Of Her Adventure!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew watch Alabasta fade into the distance, but theres no time for reminiscing. The marines are in hot pursuit, and theres a stowaway aboard the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Scent of danger! The seventh member is Nico Robin!

programme.title: Fresh off their adventure Alabasta, the Straw Hats discover an isolated island where they can restock their food supply. Chopper is left to guard the ship, but he and Nico spend the afternoon exploring instead!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The First Patient! The Untold Story Of The Rumble Ball!

programme.title: When a mail-order salesman gets lost at sea, Nami finds the paper she needs to start making maps. If the Straw Hat crew can somehow manage to survive a deadly cyclone, she might actually get some use out of it!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Uprising of the Navigator! For the Unyielding Dream!

programme.title: Heavy fog leads to a close encounter of the culinary kind when Nico fishes a marine out of the drink. The aspiring chef is concerned about the quality of his curry, and Sanji is just the guy to refine his recipe!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Recipe Handed Down! Sanji, the Iron Man of Curry

programme.title: A break in the rain provides the perfect opportunity for Usopp to help a young girl fulfill her dream of launching the worlds largest firework.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Will Make It Bloom! Usopp The Man And The Eight-Foot Shell!

programme.title: Money troubles force Zoro to tangle with Dick the Bandit and his treacherous gang of thugs. These gun-toting outlaws are terrorizing a peaceful village, and the Straw Hat swordsman aims to stop their reign of terror!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fabled Pirate Hunter! Zoro, The Wandering Swordsman

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko have been invited to a party hosted by Marcel Dulane, a member of Paris' high society. However, the elegant party turns out to be a trap. Fujiko is taken hostage and Lupin, with a time-bomb belt strapped to his waist

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Monaco to race his new toy in the Monaco Grand Prix. Or so he thought. Lupin ends up losing both his money and race car in a fixed poker game at the casino.
programme.sub-title: Bet on the Monaco Grand Prix!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A rare bottle of Bordeaux, commissioned by Napoleon for his beloved wife, Josephine, is to be given to the President of the United States as a Christmas present.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A criminal gang has hidden a microfilm containing the manufacturing process for artificial diamonds, developed by NASA, in one of Inspector Zenigata's molars. Determined to get his hands on that microfilm, Lupin must capture Inspector Zenigata.
programme.sub-title: The Great Chase in San Francisco

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Forward Hees, the world's richest man, suddenly dies a mysterious death and leaves a large ruby to Fujiko in his will. After inheriting the ruby, Fujiko comes down with the same mysterious fever as Hees
programme.sub-title: Big Adventure of the Caribbean Sea

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A Count challenges Lupin to steal a gemstone named Dracula's Tear from on board his airship, the Hendenburg. However, also on board the ship are several formidable detectives: Homes III, Detective Archer, Koojisuke Kaneda and Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is suffering from Transformation Sickness, an illness that transforms him into a cruel, cold-blooded criminal at the stroke of midnight, and leaves him with no recollection of his murderous crime spree in the morning

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A small Arab nation has received a blackmail notice. Pay a $100 million or have their oil fields blown up. Lupin targets the money, but his plans are hindered when he finds out the culprits are using human bombs.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Black Panther, the world's largest emerald, gets its name from the black panther that appears inside it when a light shines on it at a particular angle. After capturing this one-of-a-kind emerald, Lupin hides it in a museum to retrieve it later

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vault maker Marukin Safe Company is forced into bankruptcy after Lupin cracks open their impenetrable safes. To test his own skills, Marukin's son challenges Lupin to open a safe he has designed

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: While trying to snag General Hatler's prize medallion, which contains a fifty-carat ruby, Lupin inadvertently reels in Hatler's biggest secret, his toupee! An enraged General Hatler orders Lupin and his gang to be killed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Upon returning to Japan, Goemon finds his master on the brink of death. Furthermore, Jinkuro, a fellow disciple, had stolen half of the scroll containing the Secret Arts of the Iga Ninja. Will Goemon be able to avenge his master?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are in a remote area pursing a mysterious treasure, when they save a woman being chased by hoodlums. The woman invites the two back to her sister's manor, which is full of beautiful women

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A mysterious woman who claims to be Fujiko's aunt, gives Lupin an ultimatum: Find Marshal Rommel's lost gold or die! First, Lupin must decipher the location of the gold, written in ancient hieroglyphs.
programme.sub-title: A Witch in the Fourth Dimension

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The great thief Nezumi-Kozou Jirokichi IV appears before Goemon and reveals that their ancestors competed in the first International Thieves Championship together, but were defeated by Lupin's grandfather, Arsne Lupin
programme.sub-title: The Phantom Thief Rat Boy Appears

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The warden of an African prison is holding Fujiko captive. Lupin and his gang infiltrate the prison and attempt to break Fujiko out, but they become the target of the Iron Lizards, robotic devices developed to chase down fugitives!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Linda, a beautiful dancer, has stolen Jigen's heart and a vengeful Meyer has taken Fujiko hostage. Believing the women they love are in danger and unaware that Linda and Meyer are working together, Lupin and Jigen are set up to kill each other

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: According to legend, a stamp named the Cinderella Shadow is said to make its owner a princess. Lupin and his gang pull off the heist, but a girl name Alice who also wants the stamp tags along. Will the little girl get her royal wish?
programme.sub-title: Where did the Cinderella Stamp Go?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has sent a notice declaring he will steal all the cash from every bank in Paris. Detective Melon, the granddaughter of Inspector Garimard, is chosen to catch Lupin alongside Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has many secret techniques up his sleeve, and one of them is his Levitation Technique. In order to get their hands on this technique, a crime syndicate plots a dirty trick, where a fake Lupin tortures a man known as X8 and frames the real Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Inspector Zenigata get kidnapped and the two are forcibly conscripted into the Foreign Legion in Morocco. Lupin and Inspector Zenigata make a run for it, but not before they're shackled together at the neck.
programme.sub-title: The Wind in Morocco is Hot

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Beautiful Swedish twins, Latica and Anita, are engaged in a battle to the death over the Viking treasure map concealed on their backs. In disguise, Lupin learns the map's secret, but the map possesses an additional secret.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A hit has been ordered on Lupin and Puma, a formidable hitman who specializes in long-range attacks, is on his trail! Lupin takes his chances with a close range, one-on-one showdown against Puma, but the plan seemingly backfires and Lupin is shot

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Orion's Crown has been stolen and is up for grabs at a black-market auction. Lupin has his eyes on both the crown and the auction money, but first he must outsmart the other parties vying for the crown, including Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A two-thousand-year-old casket has been excavated. Inside the casket is Camilla, a beautiful woman in a near-death state, holding a golden statuette of the Virgin Mary. Lupin attempts to steal the golden statuette, but things don't go as planned
programme.sub-title: Lupin Who Turned into a Vampire

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are attending a party in Africa, waiting for an opportunity to snatch a rare black pearl. However, their plan goes awry when a gang of gorillas crashes the party and steals the black pearl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Massive riches have been hidden inside Tsukikage Castle. Lupin and his gang must decipher a code to find out the whereabouts of this great treasure. Wii Lupin be able to locate the treasure before his rivals do?
programme.sub-title: Uncover the Secret of Tsukikage Castle

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen head to Mongolia in search of Genghis Khan's treasures. Meanwhile, Goemon is visiting his ancestor's grave to pay his respects when he encounters Fujiko, who is in search of Yoshitsune Minamoto's buried treasure.
programme.sub-title: The Hidden Gold of Genghis Khan

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The ICPO chief promises to erase Fujiko's criminal record in exchange for her cooperation in arresting Lupin. Up against an ego-bruised Inspector Zenigata and a determined Fujiko, have Lupin's heisting days come to an end?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen sneak on board a ship smuggling diamonds. However, what they find on board are several thousand chickens! Lupin and his gang infiltrate the Hong Kong smuggling boss's lair where diamonds are being illicitly sold
programme.sub-title: Diamonds Disappeared Under the Sky of Hong Kong

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal a suitcase containing Costa Rican diamonds, but the contents turns out to be Inspector Zenigata. The real diamonds are being shipped to Puerto Rico inside a missile and Lupin must find out the precise launch time to intercept it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Kaguya, a beautiful woman, separately asks Lupin, Jigen and Goemon to gather the tears of the Yeti, a mermaid's scale, and the liver of a dragon so she can make a secret potion.
programme.sub-title: Search for the Treasure of Princess Kaguya

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A wealthy shipping magnate and also a bachelor, Onabes' final voyage is nothing short of extravagant, with a ship full of beautiful women and fine art. Things go as planned when Lupin infiltrates the ship disguised as a woman

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of herearning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Robocop, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy (Joel Kinnaman) -- a loving husband, father and good cop -- is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: Comes a Horseman, (1978, Western)
programme.desc: Set in the American West of the 1940s, a pair of little-guy ranchers join forces against the depredations of a ruthless land baron determined to expand his empire at whatever cost. Starring Jane Fonda, James Caan, and Jason Robards.

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: Adios, Sabata, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Under the brutal rule of garrison leader Col. Skimmel, a group of Mexican revolutionaries hire gunslinger Sabata (Yul Brynner) to rob a transport of gold in order to buy weapons. But the Colonel has other plans...taking the gold for himself.

programme.title: Return of Sabata, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: The great Lee Van Cleef ('Death Rides a Horse') returns as the famous freewheeling gunslinger Sabata. In this third and final go-round for the enigmatic sharpshooter, Sabata seeks revenge when a band of desperadoes bilks him out of $5,000.

programme.title: Five Guns To Tombstone, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw is living a clean life until his no-good brother who just escaped from prison ropes him into pulling a robbery. Now Billy has his own plan...to prevent it. And all he needs is his six shooters and a little luck.

programme.title: The Hills Run Red, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: A man recently released from a five-year prison sentence seeks vengeance against the former friend who has violated his trust and sought his death. Starring Thomas Hunter, Henry Silva, and Dan Duryea.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: The Missouri Breaks, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Marlon Brando and Jack Nicholson ignite the screen in this rousing story of a wealthy Montana rancher who hires a professional killer to track down a gang of horse thieves.

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The con is on when two swindlers (Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo) make an heiress (Rachel Weisz) the target of their next scheme.

programme.title: The Animal, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: A wannabe cop suffers a horrible car accident, and is repaired by a mad scientist who uses animal parts. Problems arise when the animal parts begin to take over.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards, (2000, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: An unhappy dentist in Montreal gets a new neighbor, Jimmy 'The Tulip' Teduski, a former mob hitman turned informant with a price on his head.

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The con is on when two swindlers (Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo) make an heiress (Rachel Weisz) the target of their next scheme.

programme.title: Man of the House, (2005, Screwball)
programme.desc: A hard-edged Texas Ranger goes undercover to protect a group of college cheerleaders after they witness a murder.

programme.title: Head of State, (2003, Political Comedies)
programme.desc: When Washington desperately needs a presidential candidate just weeks before the election, they need someone sure to lose. They pick Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock), an unknown local politician from a down-and-out D.C. neighborhood, to be their puppet.

programme.title: The Longest Yard, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a pro quarterback and former college champion and coach are asked to put together a football team of inmates to take on the guards while doing their time in prison.

programme.title: Every story and battle from the first half of the season comes crashing together in this action-packed, emotional mid-season finale.

programme.title: Daryl, Isabelle, Laurent and Sylvie face trouble on the road; Isabelle remembers the day the hungry ones appeared; Laurent struggles to fit in.

programme.title: Daryl faces old demons, recalling the circumstances that landed him in France; Isabelle's sacrifice forces her to consider drastic measures; Genet commences a celebration for the people of Paris.

programme.title: Genet ensures to strengthen her base of power; Daryl has a job to do before he can go back to America.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: La Gentillesse Des trangers

programme.title: Pouvoir attacks the Nest and Losang and Isabelle confront each other.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: Au Revoir Les Enfants

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A house of fortune opens up and gains popularity for its predictions. The customers begin to act violent. Usagi and Luna decide to investigate.
programme.sub-title: Punishment Awaits: The House Of Fortune Is The Monster Mansion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls in town are tuning in to a radio program that reads out love letters. A sleeping sickness is plaguing the town that puts people to sleep.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious Sleeping Sickness: Protect the Girls In Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is shocked to find out that shes gained weight from too much eating. Determined to get back into shape, Usagi and her friends join a gym.
programme.sub-title: Learn How to Be Skinny from Usagi

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shingo brings home a pet Chanela. Shingo becomes so absorbed in the Chanela that he stops going to school, which worries Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Scent of a Monster: Chanela Will Steal Your Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi bumps into Yusuke Amade, a famous musician who claims he is being chased by a monster. Usagi and Luna decide to keep an eye on Yusuke.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Melody of Love: Usagi Plays Cupid

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Naru dream of becoming famous like Mikan Shiratori. When the girls hear that Mikan is hosting a talent contest, they see their chance.
programme.sub-title: Usagi Learns Her Lesson: Becoming a Star Is Hard Work

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi befriends Ami Mizuno, the schools smartest girl. But Luna, who senses an unknown energy coming from Ami, suspects her of being a Monster.
programme.sub-title: The Girl Genius Is a Monster: The Brainwashing Cram School of Horror

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Ami find a clock that resembles Luna. That night, the clock emits a strange light that causes Usagi to become very impatient.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Disaster: Beware of the Clock of Confusion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: People who take the bus near the Hikawa Shrine have started to go missing. Usagi and her friends decide to investigate.
programme.sub-title: The Cursed Bus: Enter Mars, the Guardian of Fire

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians go to the amusement park where visitors have gone missing. But Usagi is more focused on playing than finding the missing people.
programme.sub-title: Usagi vs. Rei: Nightmare in Dream Land

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rei goes off on a luxury cruise with Ami after winning tickets through the local lottery. Feeling left behind, Usagi sneaks aboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: I Want a Boyfriend: The Luxury Cruise Ship is a Trap

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Jadeite is given a warning by Queen Beryl, who can no longer tolerate the generals failures. Jadeite challenges the Sailor Guardians to a showdown.
programme.sub-title: Girls Unite: The End of Jadeite

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rui is a talented tennis player but Naru has noticed a dark change in her. Worried about their classmate, Naru and Usagi go to investigate.
programme.sub-title: A New Enemy Appears: Nephrite's Evil Crest

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami brings Usagi and Rei to her favorite park. Rei decides to have a date with Mamoru at the park before it closes down.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Juban District is having a contest to decide who can design the best wedding dress. Usagi, Rei, and all the girls in town compete.
programme.sub-title: A Girl's Dream: Usagi Becomes a Bride

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A photographer named Kijin Shinokawa holds a modeling contest. All the girls who have entered begin disappearing after Shinokawa photographs them!
programme.sub-title: Usagi's a Model: The Flash of the Monster Camera

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shingos friend Mika gives him a doll but Shingo unintentionally breaks the doll and hurts Mikas feelings. Shingo decides to apologize.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi receives a love letter from Tuxedo Mask, stating that hed like to meet her. She finds out that all the girls in town received the same letter.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Joy: A Love Letter from Tuxedo Mask

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls search for a vacation spot so they can focus on training. Instead, they settle on a mansion that has a very eerie service staff.
programme.sub-title: The Summer, the Beach, Youth and Ghosts

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami spots Nephrite and follows him to an animation studio that is making the Sailor V movie. Ami calls Usagi and Rei so they can investigate.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Children's Dreams: Friendship Through Anime

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Kingdom of Diamonds is hosting a party to reveal their treasure to the world. Both the Sailor Guardians and the Dark Kingdom crash the party.
programme.sub-title: Romance Under the Moon: Usagi's First Kiss

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Naru has fallen in love with Masato Sanjoin. Knowing that Sanjoin is really Nephrite, Usagi tries to convince Naru to give up on her feelings.
programme.sub-title: Wish upon a Star: Naru's First Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nephrite uncovers Sailor Moons identity as Usagi. His attempt to finish her off is cut short when he learns that Naru has been kidnapped by Zoisite.
programme.sub-title: Naru's Tears: Nephrite Dies for Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A new girl named Makoto Kino transfers to Usagis school, but her tough attitude seems to scare everyone away. Usagi quickly becomes friends with her.
programme.sub-title: Jupiter, the Powerful Girl in Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians grow in strength with its newest member Sailor Jupiter joining the team. Sailor Moon is appointed as team leader.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi learns that a transfer student named Ryo Urawa seems to have a crush on Ami, and tries to help him out.
programme.sub-title: Crushing on Ami: The Boy Who Can See the Future

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Naru attend an art exhibit by Yumemi Yumeno. Usagi and Mamoru are both asked by Yumemi to become models for her latest painting.
programme.sub-title: The Painting of Love: Usagi and Mamoru Get Closer

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Makoto discover Motoki has a girlfriend named Reika. His relationship is in jeopardy due to Reikas chance to study abroad.
programme.sub-title: Total Chaos: The Messy Love Rectangle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Grandpa Hino has become emotionally unstable, causing Rei to worry. The new apprentice Yuichiro tries to cheer her up.
programme.sub-title: Grandpa Loses Control: Rei in Danger

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and friends meet a girl who they believe holds the final Rainbow Crystal. But they realize its her pet cat that possesses the Rainbow Crystal!
programme.sub-title: Loved and Chased: Luna's Worst Day Ever

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Umino seems to have fallen in love with Naru. Naru only considers Umino a friend, so Usagi decides to play Cupid and urges them to go on a date.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: When the exploits of a Sailor Moon imposter become quite the sensation, the real Sailor Guardians step in to investigate.
programme.sub-title: Enter Venus, the Last Sailor Guardian

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: O Homem da Mfia

programme.title: Soldado Universal 3: Regenerao
programme.desc: Um soldado ressuscitado e geneticamente modificado enfrenta seus inimigos, contratados por terroristas nucleares.

programme.title: A Perseguio
programme.desc: Ottway trabalha em um lugar isolado no Alasca. Certo dia, quando retornava cidade para matar a saudade da esposa, o avio cai. Feridos e sem alimentos, os sobreviventes lutam pela vida e tentam reencontrar a civilizao.

programme.title: Chuva Negra
programme.desc: Nick Conklin e Charlie Vincent so dois detetives da polcia de Nova York que precisam escoltar um assassino at o Japo. Mas o preso escapa e, para captura-lo, eles acabam se envolvendo em uma guerra entre gangues rivais da mfia japonesa.

programme.title: Perigo em Bangkok
programme.desc: Joe um assassino que est na Tailndia para realizar quatro assassinatos sob encomenda. Os alvos so inimigos de Surat, um chefo do crime local. Para no ter que realizar o trabalho sozinho ele contrata Kong, um batedor de carteiras.

programme.title: A Arma
programme.desc: Dallas uma mquina de matar. Seus ataques a gangues de motociclistas e laboratrios de metanfetamina irritam o chefe da mfia de Las Vegas, que sequestra sua namorada. Dallas no ir parar at que a justia seja feita.

programme.title: Fogo contra Fogo
programme.desc: Um bombeiro fora de servio testemunha um assassinato nas mos de uma gangue de gangsters. Ele entra no programa de proteo a testemunhas at depor, mas no pode se esconder por muito tempo da gangue, ento decide agir por conta prpria.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite
programme.desc: Selene, uma guerreira vampira, est imersa em um conflito entre vampiros e lobisomens, enquanto se apaixona por Michael, um humano que procurado por lobisomens por razes desconhecidas.

programme.title: O Semideus
programme.desc: Um casal viaja para uma cabana isolada e descobrem a histria aterrorizante do local. No demora at que tenham que enfrentar momentos de puro horror na imensa floresta que os cerca.

programme.title: O Espantalho
programme.desc: Amigos presos encontram espantalhos sobrenaturais em uma fazenda isolada.

programme.title: Fenmenos Paranormais 2
programme.desc: Um ano depois de uma equipe de filmagem ter passado uma noite fatal no Hospital Psiquitrico de Collingwood, uma nova equipe est entrando nos corredores em busca da verdade. Isto , se algum for deixado vivo para contar a histria.

programme.title: O Principal Suspeito
programme.desc: Sem dinheiro, o estudante Martin vira vigia noturno no necrotrio da cidade, mas o tranquilo trabalho se torna aterrorizante quando um assassino em srie passa a deixar pistas que apontam para ele.

programme.title: O 3 andar: Terror na Rua Malasaa

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao - S1E38
programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi - S1E39
programme.desc: Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vov Chiyo, perita em veneno, chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara comeam o jutsu de selamento e os nove drages fantasmas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta - S1E40
programme.desc: Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mos firmes. Vov Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua prpria aprendiz e pela determinao de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informaes sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um co de caa ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia - S1E41
programme.desc: Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos Akatsuki. Temari recebe ordens para ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vov Chiyo se oferece para ficar no lugar de Temari. Naruto e Sakura ficam chocados com a histria das bestas de cauda.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki - S1E42
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe comeam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lana um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura - S1E43
programme.desc: Guy se arrepende ao ver seus trs alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxignio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha - S1E44
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi comea um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio - S1E45
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada - S1E46
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguio recomea, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto tambm um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara engolfado por uma luz branca.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra! - S1E47
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma viso chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos - S1E48
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante... - S1E49
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado - S1E50
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro - S1E51
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha - S1E52
programme.desc: Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E3
programme.desc: Depois de se envolver na briga entre Metal e Shikadai, Boruto percebe que Metal est com o chakra estranho, assim como o de Denki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E4
programme.desc: Seguindo a sugesto do professor Shino Aburame, Boruto e seus colegas de classe fazem um jogo de captura bandeira de meninas contra meninos no terrao.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E5
programme.desc: Um estudante misterioso chamado Mitsuki transferido da Aldeia do Som para a sala de Boruto.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E6
programme.desc: Boruto, Shikadai e Mitsuki notam que o professor est agindo de forma diferente e, de repente, Shino os ataca!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E7
programme.desc: Cho-Cho fica com medo por achar que est sendo observada, ento ela decide pegar a pessoa desprevenida.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E8
programme.desc: Um Jutsu Visual coloca Boruto dentro de um sonho. Depois disso, Boruto passa a afirmar que o sonho fez despertar seu Byakugan, o Kekkei Genkai do cl Hyuga, de sua me.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E9
programme.desc: Sob a superviso de seu pai e seu av, Boruto treina com sua tia Hanabi. Ele se esfora muito, mas no consegue ativar o Byakugan de jeito nenhum.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E10
programme.desc: Boruto apelida a sombra misteriosa de "O Fantasma" e fica animado quando seus amigos, Shikadai e Mitsuki, se juntam a ele para resolver os recentes "Incidentes de Fantasmas".

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E11
programme.desc: Em trabalho escolar sobre profisses, Sumire, Wasabi Izuno e Namida Suzumeno acabam se envolvendo em um Incidente de Fantasma e se machucam.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E12
programme.desc: De repente, os Incidentes de Fantasmas param, deixando Boruto e seus colegas de classe intrigados. No entanto, parece que Mitsuki sabe de algo que eles no sabem.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E13
programme.desc: Aps a investigao de Sai, o Stimo Hokage, Naruto e seus principais conselheiros ficam perplexos ao descobrir quem o culpado. Ento Nue, uma fera enorme de outro mundo, aparece!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E14
programme.desc: O falecido Danzo Shimura foi o fundador e lder da Fundao, uma organizao de Caadores Especiais Anbu de elite.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E15
programme.desc: Os Incidentes de Fantasmas que ameaaram a Aldeia da Folha chegam ao fim. Agora Boruto se v incapaz de despertar o poder misterioso que ele havia usado.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E16
programme.desc: O dia da prova est cada vez mais prximo e todos da Academia esto se preparando. Quem falhar ter que repetir a srie.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E17
programme.desc: Sarada concorda em entregar um ursinho de pelcia para um paciente no hospital, mas acaba esquecendo o urso no trem e entra em pnico.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E18
programme.desc: A casa dos Uzumaki entra em caos quando Himawari, a irm caula de Boruto, pega uma gripe.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E19
programme.desc: Boruto faz uma pegadinha, e Naruto corre atrs dele pela aldeia. Ao ver isso, Sarada fica irritada, mas ao mesmo tempo pensativa sobre seu pai, Sasuke, que no a v desde beb.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E20
programme.desc: Sarada duvida que Sakura seja sua me biolgica, e se junta a Cho-Cho, que est prestes a sair em uma jornada em busca dos seus "pais verdadeiros".

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E21
programme.desc: Sarada chega na torre onde o pai est, mas acaba se magoando com a atitude inesperada de Sasuke.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E22
programme.desc: Sarada fica em choque aps Sakura ser capturada pelo jutsu de Shin. Nem mesmo Naruto, com suas habilidades de rastreamento excepcionais, consegue localiz-la.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E23
programme.desc: Determinada a resgatar Sakura, Sarada vai atrs de Shin junto com Sasuke, Naruto e Cho-Cho.

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S1E28

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S1E29

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S1E30

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S1E31

programme.title: Aps o deck Mquina de Bandit Keith forar Joey a jogar na defensiva, Joey copia a estratgia de Keith e metaliza seu Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos! Sua vitria certa, ou o trapaceiro Bandit Keith tem literalmente uma ltima carta debaixo da manga?

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S1E35

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S1E37

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S1E39

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S1E41

programme.title: Rebecca est enganada em acreditar que o av de Yugi roubou o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis do av dela. Yugi precisa defender o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis para ensinar a ela que o que conta no o poder das cartas, mas o corao delas.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - S1E42

programme.desc: A Southern lawyer (Matthew McConaughey) and his legal assistant (Sandra Bullock) defend a black man (Samuel L. Jackson) for killing his young daughters white attackers.

programme.title: Murder Company (2024)
programme.desc: During the D-Day invasion, a group of U.S. soldiers must smuggle a member of the French resistance behind enemy lines to assassinate a high-value Nazi target.

programme.title: Buddy Games: Spring Awakening (2023)
programme.desc: Faced with their biggest challenge yet, the gang sets out to honor a lost pal, only to find themselves in the middle of where it all began -- spring break. They soon learn their old school ways of partying can hardly compete with todays generation.

programme.title: Student Bodies (1981)

programme.title: Monster Trucks (2016)
programme.desc: A high school senior (Lucas Till) befriends a strange subterranean creature after building a monster truck from bits and pieces of scrapped cars.

programme.desc: A terrifying new horror awaits Laura and her 7-year-old son, Cody, when they flee her abusive ex-husband and try to settle into a new life. Still traumatized, their fragile existence is pushed to the breaking point.

programme.title: The Uninvited (2009)
programme.desc: A ghost prompts a lethal battle of wills between a mans new fiancee (Elizabeth Banks) and his two daughters (Emily Browning, Arielle Kebbel), one of whom has just returned from a mental ward.

programme.title: The Bye Bye Man (2017)
